modShortDescription: This mod adds a robot companion to help carry your stuff. He's not perfect, but he will do his very best to keep up with you.
modDescription:
This mod adds a [robot](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-robots/) companion to help carry your stuff. Heâ€™s not perfect, but he will do his very best to keep up with you. You will occasionally have to smack him to teach him who the boss is though.

Requires finding a schematic to learn, and craftable on the workbench.

If he dies, he will stay the same length of time as your [backpack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/), so that you still have time to retrieve your stuff.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_Robot_Dog)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/)
